summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.0°C) and outside temperature (up 1.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9364 lux) and cloud levels (up 329 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14777 lux), cloud levels (up 1908 m), feels like temperature (up 1.5°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 329.0m lower than yesterday, 832.4m lower than the past week, 1908.3m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 713m to a maximum of 1594m, averaging 738.0m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1570.4m and 2650m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, very clammy and humid and calm and still conditions are expected. Periods of rain anticipated, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and low sunlight due to cloudy or overcast skies. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
